title: Ep. 669 This is All a Smokescreen
description:
In this episode I address some explosive connections between the Obama team, the Clinton team, and the Russians that are yet to be touched by investigative charges. 

These companies are pretending to be nonpartisan while funding partisan organizations. 

More ties between Hillary and Russian actors. 

This Russian bank has some interesting connections to Skolkovo.

Gun laws only impact the good guys. The bad guys don’t care about gun laws.

Why are the Democrats panicking about a citizenship question?

The Democrats' war on the Electoral College continues. 

Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
